com.connectfour.view

Class TileGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectfour.view.TileGrid

  • public class TileGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a container for our drawable pieces. It refers to the basic Board data object and mirrors its state with Tile pieces. It also holds our clickable buttons for the user and listens for click events.
